output: Print the result with 5 digits after the decimal point or the message if it is impossible to calculate.
input: Read 3 floating-point numbers A, B and C.
name: Bhaskara's Formula
description: Read 3 floating-point numbers. After, print the roots of bhaskara’s formula. If it's impossible to calculate the roots because a division by zero or a square root of a negative number, presents the message “Impossivel calcular”.
